com.samsung.android.sdk.health.sensor

Class ShealthSensorDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.health.sensor.ShealthSensorDevice

  • public class ShealthSensorDevice
extends Object
    This class provides the functionality to maintain device information.

      This class contains body temperature data.

      Class to send measure data for coaching

      Class to send measure data for coaching result

      Class to send commands to sensor device.

      This listener interface receives sensor device data.
      static class  ShealthSensorDevice.Electrocardiogram
      Class to send measure data for electrocardiogram.
      static interface  ShealthSensorDevice.EventListener
      This listener interface receives joining and leaving status events and command response events.

      This class contains exercise data.

      This class contains fitness data.

      representative Class to send measure data from sensor

      Class to send measure data for heart rate.

      Class to send measure data for Humidity.

      Creates an ShealthSensorDevice.Location instance.

      Class to send measure data for pedometer.

      Class to send measure data for Profile

      Class to send measure data for pulse oximeter.
      static class  ShealthSensorDevice.Response
      This class contains the response from the sensor, and is returned in the request() method or in the onResponseReceived() callback.

      Class to send measure data for sleep

      Class to send measure data for weight.

    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_HEATH_DATA_UPDATED

        public static final String ACTION_HEATH_DATA_UPDATED
        Broadcast Action: The new health data has updated to database. Always contains the extra fields EXTRA_CONNECTION_TYPE, EXTRA_DEVICE_TYPE and EXTRA_DATA_TYPE. Constant Value: "com.samsung.android.sdk.health.sensor.action.DATA_UPDATED"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_CONNECTION_TYPE

        public static final String EXTRA_CONNECTION_TYPE
        Used as an int extra field in ACTION_HEATH_DATA_UPDATED intents to notify the sensor data update event. Possible values are: CONNECTIVITY_TYPE_XXX Constant Value: "com.samsung.android.sdk.health.sensor.extra.CONNECTION_TYPE"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_DEVICE_TYPE

        public static final String EXTRA_DEVICE_TYPE
        Used as an int extra field in ACTION_HEATH_DATA_UPDATED intents to notify the sensor data update event. Possible values are: Type.XXX Constant Value: "com.samsung.android.sdk.health.sensor.extra.DEVICE_TYPE"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ShealthSensorDevice

        public ShealthSensorDevice()
                    throws IllegalStateException
        Creates an ShealthSensorDevice instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the device does not support ShealthSensorDevice.

    • Method Detail

      • getSerialNumber

        public String getSerialNumber()
                       throws IllegalStateException
        Get the device serial number.
        Returns:
        The serial number. The method returns null if the serial number is not available.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the device does not support ShealthSensorDevice.

             throws IllegalStateException

      • getType

        public int getType()
            throws IllegalStateException
        Gets the device type.
        Returns:
        The int containing the device type like WEIGHT_SCALE, BLOOD_PRESSURE, etc
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the device does not support ShealthSensorDevice.

      • getDataType

        public List<Integer> getDataType()
                          throws IllegalStateException
        Gets the device data type. Some device provide several type of data
        Returns:
        The int containing the device data type like Blood Pressure Monitor, Blood Glucose Meter, etc
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the device does not support ShealthSensorDevice.

        public String getProtocol()
                   throws IllegalStateException
        Gets the protocol type.
        Returns:
        The String containing the protocol type like Continua, SHAP, etc.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the device does not support ShealthSensorDevice.

        public int getConnectivityType()
                        throws IllegalStateException
        Gets the connectivity type. For example ShealthSensorDevice.CONNECTIVITY_TYPE_ANT etc.
        Returns:
        The connectivity type of sensor
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if device is null

        public boolean isConnected()

        Returns:

      • startListeningData

        public void startListeningData(ShealthSensorDevice.DataListener listener)
                        throws RemoteException,
                               IllegalArgumentException,
                               IllegalStateException,
                               ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException
        Stop receiving data from the sensor.
        Parameters:
        listener - The DataListener instance that sends data from the sensor.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Thrown if the connection fails.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if an argument passed is not valid.
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the device does not support ShealthSensorDevice.
        ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException - Thrown if the application is not connected to the Health Sensor Service.

      • stopListeningData

        public void stopListeningData()
                       throws RemoteException,
                              ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException,
                              IllegalStateException
        Stop listening for data.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener callback passed in startReceivingData() method
        Throws:
        RemoteException - , ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException, IllegalStateException

        IllegalStateException
